name: Electric Sleep
description: Electric Sleep is a pixel art interactive story. Explore a crumbling world as an emotionally driven robot.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8/8.1/10 Processor: Any above 2ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 Supported Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 Processor: 64bit, Minimum 2ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 4 Supported Storage: 3 GB available space
